NRC - Canada.from sentence: NRC - Canada is the top method in SemEval 2014 Task 4 for ACSA and ATSA task .

CNN.from sentence: CNN is widely used on text classification task .

uses.from sentence: TD - LSTM uses two LSTM networks to model the preceding and following contexts of the target to generate target - dependent representation for sentiment prediction .

ATAE - LSTM.from sentence: ATAE - LSTM is an attention - based LSTM for ACSA task .

IAN.from sentence: IAN stands for interactive attention network for ATSA task , which is also based on LSTM and attention mechanisms .

RAM.from sentence: RAM is a recurrent attention network for ATSA task , which uses LSTM and multiple attention mechanisms .

GCN.from sentence: GCN stands for gated convolutional neural network , in which GTRU does not have the aspect embedding as an additional input .
